Author: flr
Description:
Call Home:

Call home as fast as you can. The first team will get a free flag. Others better luck next time.
News: An anonymous source says that Demat Corporation as poor security practices and standards.

Author: flr
Description:
Search for it

Four parts of a flag have been hidden in the page context. Find each of them and the submit the flag : PART1PART2PART3PART4
News: Demat confidential documents have been leaked on the internet. The company have not yet confirmed the authenticity of those documents.

Author: flr
Description:
Scan the network :

Look for reachable services. Each identified service will give you points.
To retrieve a flag associate with a service, call the "getFlag" function with the URI parameter set to the URI describing the service. i.e.: <scheme>://<hostname>:<port>

Author: flr
Description:
Scan the network :

Look for reachable services. Each identified service will give you points.
To retrieve a flag associate with a service, call the "getFlag" function with the URI parameter set to the URI describing the service. i.e.: <scheme>://<hostname>:<port>

Author: flr
Description:
Mini level up 1:

For one of the identified service, a common Web application is running. Identified it!
To retrieve a flag associate with a service, call the "getFlag" with the URI parameter set to the URI describing the service and the application. i.e.: <scheme>://<hostname>:<port>/<application_path>
News: This morning, officials of Demat reported that they were victim of a data breach. They say that everything is now under control and that they have hired the best experts to investigate the breach.

Author: flr
Description:
Mini level up 2:

An XSS vulnerability has been added to an existing feature of the Web application. Find it!
The flag is somewhere in the source code of the vulnerable page.
News: After months of investigation, Demat and the FBI are about to drop hacking charges one or many individuals.

Author: flr
Description:
Mini level up 3:

Try to log in the Web application with account often used to debug things. To retrieve a flag associate with a service, call the "getFlag" function with the URI parameter set to the URI used to log into the application i.e.: <scheme>://<hostname>:<port>/<path>
News: Using basic social engineering techniques, hackers have been able to access Demat CSO emails. In one of them we could learn that the company is still under attack and that the initial breach have not been circumvent yet.

Author: flr
Description:
Mini level up 4:

Look inside the Web application for valuable information.
News: The Demat CEO have resign following the massive data breach the company has suffered recently.
